_note: This file demonstrates how custom mods can provide their own transport mappings.
_usage: Rename this file to 'transport-mappings-yourmodname.json' and customize the mappings below.
_loading_order: Files are loaded alphabetically. Later files override earlier ones. For example: transport-mappings.json (base), transport-mappings-atlantis.json (mod), transport-mappings-zzz-user-overrides.json (user custom)
